content.1: And it came to pass, when all the kings of the Amorites, which
content.3: And Joshua made him sharp knives, and circumcised the children of Israel at the hill of the foreskins.
content.5: Now all the people that came out were circumcised: but all the people
content.6: For the children of Israel walked forty years in the wilderness, till all the people
content.8: And it came to pass, when they had done circumcising all the people, that they abode in their places in the camp, till they were whole.
content.10: And the children of Israel encamped in Gilgal, and kept the passover on the fourteenth day of the month at even in the plains of Jericho.
content.11: And they did eat of the old corn of the land on the morrow after the passover, unleavened cakes, and parched
content.12: And the manna ceased on the morrow after they had eaten of the old corn of the land; neither had the children of Israel manna any more; but they did eat of the fruit of the land of Canaan that year.
content.13: And it came to pass, when Joshua was by Jericho, that he lifted up his eyes and looked, and, behold, there stood a man over against him with his sword drawn in his hand: and Joshua went unto him, and said unto him,
